Text:
The guys at bobmergames worked 8 years of there lifes at this wonderfull remake!! They previously contacted SEGA. There was no problem and nothing stood in there way. The whole game is builded from scratch and nothing is used from the original. Now that the final version is out and was in the news SEGA shut down the download site. Hopefully they get to a understanding. 
Game Works Great!!!Thanxs Tavsen!!!!
Thank you very much for the upload. Sega eat a diiiick!

I'm kind of terrified right now. When I push down on the base of my erect penis, I hear and feel a 'pop' kind of like when you crack your knuckles. I've been doing this for a few months (it feels great) but now my penis has turned blue/black/purple and is incredibly painful. I'm too embarrassed to go to the hospital so I'm thinking of amputating it myself. Do you think I should play this game before or after I amputate?
